title: Why doesn't any of my classmates talk to me? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, let’s see here: Are you kind? If you’re a bit of an arrogant, inconsiderate redneck, then chances are no one wants to be associated with you. I’ve found simple acts of kindness can go a long way (no, I’m not some mum telling you how valuable kindness is).Are you attractive? This one gets the chicks every time (assuming you’re a boy). Chances are that if you’re smoking hot, you’ll get attention from some girls (again, assuming you’re a boy). Other boys will get jealous of the attention from the opposite gender and probably will want to be associated with you to get some stares too. They probably wanna know your secrets. And girls will talk to you more often.Are you a geek? While having geeky traits can attract well, geeks, most students (especially in high school) don’t want to associate themselves with a couch potato who has a sexual attraction to his computer.Are you smart? People either envy smart people, or they ask them questions (or at least ask them to do their assignments).Have you done something publicly embarrassing in the last 30 days? High schoolers are brutal. While some forget about it, others like to bring up that time you tripped down the stairs and will laugh about it.Most importantly, have you talked to them? Not all people like to break the ice. Tell the people of the Titanic that.
